docs.abstract: A little-noticed provision in the tax law seeks to drive investment to parts of the country that are still waiting for the economic recovery to arrive.
docs.snippet: A little-noticed provision in the tax law seeks to drive investment to parts of the country that are still waiting for the economic recovery to arrive.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — A little-noticed section in the $1.5 trillion tax cut that President Trump signed into law late last month is drawing attention from venture capitalists, state government officials and mayors across America.

headline.main: Tucked Into the Tax Bill, a Plan to Help Distressed America
headline.print_headline: A Potential Win for Distressed America

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: White House Council of Economic Advisers

docs.abstract: Most provisions of the new tax law won’t affect this year’s returns, with the exception of a temporary change broadening the deduction for medical expenses.
docs.snippet: Most provisions of the new tax law won’t affect this year’s returns, with the exception of a temporary change broadening the deduction for medical expenses.
docs.lead_paragraph: Tax season officially opens next week, so it’s time to get your documents organized if you haven’t already.

headline.main: It’s Tax Time: What to Remember
headline.print_headline: It’s Tax Time: Not Much Has Changed, but Here’s What to Remember

docs.abstract: To encourage conversions of old office buildings into condos, the district council is considering a bill that would enable a “Manhattanizing of the District of Columbia.”
docs.snippet: To encourage conversions of old office buildings into condos, the district council is considering a bill that would enable a “Manhattanizing of the District of Columbia.”
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — In a 43-square-block portion of the booming central business district, there are just 23 residential units, condos in a row of four late-19th-century townhomes on Jefferson Place, just south of Dupont Circle. It’s a minuscule number compared with the 33 million square feet of office space in the same area.

headline.main: A Push to Make Washington’s Downtown More Livable
headline.print_headline: A Push to Make the Nation’s Capital More Livable

docs.abstract: Microsoft regularly pushes out security patches and other fixes, but if Windows 10 fails to install them, you can usually find out why.
docs.snippet: Microsoft regularly pushes out security patches and other fixes, but if Windows 10 fails to install them, you can usually find out why.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I keep getting Windows Update “failed” error messages with a long number (0x80070020) when I try to install Microsoft’s patches for Windows 10. Clicking the Retry button leads again to failure. What does this number mean and why can’t this system update itself properly?

docs.abstract: With the enactment of new privacy rules in Europe, it isn’t just regulators going after Big Tech: Advocates like Max Schrems are already filing lawsuits.
docs.snippet: With the enactment of new privacy rules in Europe, it isn’t just regulators going after Big Tech: Advocates like Max Schrems are already filing lawsuits.
docs.lead_paragraph: At midnight last Friday, the European Union’s long-awaited new data-protection rules, known as the General Data Protection Regulation, officially kicked in.

headline.main: The Privacy Lawyer Giving Big Tech an $8.8 Billion Headache
headline.print_headline: Unleashing Legal Assault On Big Tech

docs.abstract: Even if you delete a finished book right from the iPad’s Kindle collection, you still have a backup copy in Amazon’s cloud.
docs.snippet: Even if you delete a finished book right from the iPad’s Kindle collection, you still have a backup copy in Amazon’s cloud.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. How do you delete Kindle books you have finished on an iPad?

docs.abstract: The HEIF or HEIC container format stores quality photos in smaller file sizes to save space, but not every program can open them yet without help.
docs.snippet: The HEIF or HEIC container format stores quality photos in smaller file sizes to save space, but not every program can open them yet without help.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I manage content on our school’s website, including pictures. A colleague sent me pictures of an event from an iPhone, and they were in HEIC format. I couldn’t open them in Photoshop Elements, and our site won’t accept HEIC files for uploading. What now? I use a Windows PC.

headline.main: Converting High Efficiency Image File Photos for Windows

docs.abstract: Laptop makers may have tossed the CD/DVD drive overboard, but there are solutions for those who want to watch movies on disc or archive files.
docs.snippet: Laptop makers may have tossed the CD/DVD drive overboard, but there are solutions for those who want to watch movies on disc or archive files.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I want to buy a lightweight laptop, but I need to use CDs and DVDs, which none of these models have anymore. Is there any way to still use discs with these tiny computers?

headline.main: Tiny Laptop? Bring Your Own Disc Drive

docs.abstract: If you have trouble reading the descriptive text on screen, you might be able to adjust the size, color and font in your app or device settings.
docs.snippet: If you have trouble reading the descriptive text on screen, you might be able to adjust the size, color and font in your app or device settings.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Now that I’ve figured out how to turn on closed captions, how can I make the text for them bigger?

headline.main: Closed Captions You Can Actually See

docs.abstract: Several apps and services make it easy to turn that perfect video snippet into an animated GIF file that you can share by text message or email.
docs.snippet: Several apps and services make it easy to turn that perfect video snippet into an animated GIF file that you can share by text message or email.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. How can I make one of those looping GIFs from a video clip on my phone?
